DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetics ( absorption , distribution , breakdown elimination body ) single dose bazedoxifene ( BZA ) 20 mg tablet administer together multiple dos Premarin ( conjugate estrogens CE ) healthy postmenopausal woman . Information also obtain regard safety tolerability combination healthy , postmenopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Premarin Bazedoxifene Potential Interaction
DOC.criteria: For inclusion study , woman must healthy postmenopausal ( either naturally surgically ) age 35 70 , inclusive . Blood hormone level must consistent postmenopausal state ( specified subject ) . They either nonsmoker smoke less 10 cigarette per day , able abstain smoking clinic confinement A subject exclude participation : Have participate clinical drug study within 30 day prior study medication administration ; Have history drug alcohol abuse within 1 year consume 2 standard unit per day alcohol ( standard unit equal 12 ounce beer , 1 Â½ ounce 80proof alcohol 6 ounce wine ) ; Donate plasma blood total study .
